name: Conexus
description:
Touch the shapes to connect them. Close cycles to earn points and keep playing. Unique gameplay, clean visuals and simple sound effects combine for a pleasant but fast-paced experience.

FEATURES:
  • Simple gameplay
  • Great sound and visual effects
  • Quick gameplay sessions
  • Two game modes to test your skills

Available for free at the Google Play Store, Windows Phone and App Store!

Press Kit
